Title: Dispossessed Warriors
Intro: Each model in a Dispossessed Warriors unit is armed with one of the following weapon options: Duardin Axe or a Duardin Hammer; or Double-handed Duardin Axe. All models in the unit must be armed with the same weapon option.

Rules.Name: Champion
Rules.Rule: CHAMPION: 1 model in this unit can be a Veteran. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that modelâ€™s melee weapon.

Rules.Name: Standard Bearer
Rules.Rule: STANDARD BEARER: 1 in every 10 models in this unit can be a Standard Bearer. Add 1 to the Bravery characteristic of this unit if it includes any Standard Bearers.

Rules.Name: Musician
Rules.Rule: MUSICIAN: 1 in every 10 models in this unit can be a Hornblower. You can add 1 to charge rolls for this unit if it includes any Hornblowers.

Rules.Name: Resolute In Defence
Rules.Rule: ABILITIESResolute in Defence: Add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target this unit if this unit has not made a charge move in the same turn.
